Welcome

To Mark The 2020 Year Of Coasts And Waters The National Library Of Scotland Has Created This Resource To Celebrate Scotlandâ€™s Coastal Communities With A Small Sample From The Mackinnon Collection. This Collection Comprises More Than 14,000 Photographs Of Scotland Spanning The 1840S To The Mid-20Th Century And Was Jointly Acquired With The National Galleries Of Scotland With Help From The National Lottery Heritage Fund, The Scottish Government And Art Fund.
